title: Custom components
description: Brand new components and templates to help folks quickly get started with Bootstrap and demonstrate best practices for adding onto the framework.

list.title: Album
list.description: Simple one-page template for photo galleries, portfolios, and more.

list.title: Pricing
list.description: Example pricing page built with Cards and featuring a custom header and footer.

list.title: Checkout
list.description: Custom checkout form showing our form components and their validation features.

list.title: Product
list.description: Lean product-focused marketing page with extensive grid and image work.

list.title: Cover
list.description: A one-page template for building simple and beautiful home pages.

list.title: Carousel
list.description: Customize the navbar and carousel, then add some new components.

list.title: Blog
list.description: Magazine like blog template with header, navigation, featured content.

list.title: Dashboard
list.description: Basic admin dashboard shell with fixed sidebar and navbar.

list.title: Sign-in
list.description: Custom form layout and design for a simple sign in form.

list.title: Sticky footer
list.description: Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport when page content is short.

list.title: Sticky footer navbar
list.description: Attach a footer to the bottom of the viewport with a fixed top navbar.

title: Framework
description: Examples that focus on implementing uses of built-in components provided by Bootstrap.

list.title: Starter template
list.description: Nothing but the basics: compiled CSS and JavaScript.

list.title: Grid
list.description: Multiple examples of grid layouts with all four tiers, nesting, and more.

list.title: Jumbotron
list.description: Build around the jumbotron with a navbar and some basic grid columns.

title: Navbars
description: Taking the default navbar component and showing how it can be moved, placed, and extended.

list.title: Navbars
list.description: Demonstration of all responsive and container options for the navbar.

list.title: Navbar static
list.description: Single navbar example of a static top navbar along with some additional content.

list.title: Navbar fixed
list.description: Single navbar example with a fixed top navbar along with some additional content.

list.title: Navbar bottom
list.description: Single navbar example with a bottom navbar along with some additional content.

title: Experiments
description: Examples that focus on future-friendly features or techniques.

list.title: Floating labels
list.description: Beautifully simple forms with floating labels over your inputs.

list.title: Offcanvas
list.description: Turn your expandable navbar into a sliding offcanvas menu.
